description.summary: Professionals responsible for planning, managing, and executing events and productions within the entertainment industry. They ensure all aspects of an event run smoothly from conception to completion.
commonCharacteristics: Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
description.typicalBackground: Individuals typically have a background in event management, production coordination, or related fields, often holding degrees in arts, communications, or business.

matchReasons: Current role as Production Coordinator at Giant Spoon
Extensive experience in managing productions and events
Skills in management, stage management, and creative problem solving

description.summary: Creative professionals specializing in the application of makeup and prosthetics to create dramatic and realistic special effects for theater, film, and events.
commonCharacteristics: High level of creativity and artistic ability
Proficiency in various makeup techniques and materials
description.typicalBackground: Individuals often have training in makeup artistry, theater arts, or visual arts, with hands-on experience in special effects makeup.

matchReasons: Freelance experience as a Special Effects Makeup Artist
Skills in sculpting, mold making, and SFX application
Passion for creativity and beauty in makeup

description.summary: Experts in overseeing the logistical and operational aspects of theater productions, ensuring seamless performances by coordinating between various departments and managing backstage activities.
commonCharacteristics: Strong leadership and team management skills
Ability to remain calm under pressure
description.typicalBackground: Typically hold degrees in theater arts or stage management, with significant hands-on experience in managing live performances and coordinating production teams.

matchReasons: Experience as Production Stage Manager and Stage Manager
Skills in stage management and team leadership
Background in theater and live event coordination
